title: [Health] As a four-day work week is trialed in countries across the globe, health researchers say they’re ‘all in’ when it comes to a long weekend, research shows that the extra time off is good for our health

[Health] Reseachers measured the concentrations of 20 chemicals emitted from materials in a new car parked outside over 12 consecutive summer days. They found that formaldehyde and acetaldehyde (carcicogens) concentrations surpassed allowed levels in China.
